name: lumen-browser
description: Lumen - minimalist AI-powered Chromium browser shell for Windows

scripts.dev:main: tsup src/main/main.ts src/main/preload.ts --format cjs --out-dir dist/main --target node20 --sourcemap --watch --clean
scripts.dev:electron: wait-on tcp:5173 file:dist/main/main.js && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron .
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer
scripts.build:main: tsup src/main/main.ts src/main/preload.ts --format cjs --out-dir dist/main --target node20 --sourcemap --clean
